mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REVIEW (user_id, content_id, content, score) VALUES (#{userId}, #{contentId}, #{content}, #{score});
mapper.select: SELECT r.review_id, r.user_id, u.user_nickname, r.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.latitude, a.longitude, r.content, r.score, r.createAt, r.updateAt FROM review r INNER JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN attraction_info a ON r.content_id = a.content_id WHERE r.user_id = #{userId};

SELECT r.review_id, r.user_id, u.user_nickname, r.content_id, a.title, a.addr1, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.latitude, a.longitude, r.content, r.score, r.createAt, r.updateAt FROM review r INNER JOIN user u ON r.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN attraction_info a ON r.content_id = a.content_id WHERE r.content_id = #{contentId}
SELECT visited_id FROM visited WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND content_id = #{contentId}

SELECT c.check_id, c.user_id, c.content_id, u.user_nickname, a.title, a.addr1, a.zipcode, a.first_image, a.first_image2, a.readcount, a.sido_code, a.gugun_code, a.latitude, a.longitude FROM `check` c INNER JOIN user u ON c.user_id = u.user_id INNER JOIN attraction_info a ON a.content_id = c.content_id WHERE c.user_id = #{userId}
SELECT review_id FROM review WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND content_id = #{contentId}
